name: Voluntary Support Alliance For Human Action Plan (VSAHAP)

address: Village: Itwa (Tejapur), P.O.- Madarbhari, Tehsil: Bhiti

briefDescription: Voluntary Support Alliance for Human Action Plan (VSAHAP) was incorporated by Sri Ram Nayan Singh in 2011-12 as state level NGO under the Societies Registration Act, 1860, at Ambedkar Nagar, Uttar Pradesh-224132, India with collective objectives of alleviating poverty, establishing social security and social justice and protecting human rights & child rights, empowering women & children for their amelioration across society through voluntary human action and plan. VSAHAP is making its ceaseless efforts to integrate people with like-minded organizations to register their protest against repressive and arbitrary actions, injustice, exploitation, corruption and so on. VSAHAP working over more than 5000 population.
